CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 14 The optical absorption onset of PSFDTBT film is at 629 nm , corresponding to an optical band gap of 1.97 eV.

Let's think step by step.
1. PSFDTBT: This is the name of the material. It is an acronym for a specific type of organic semiconductor film.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.
1. PSFDTBT: This is the name of the material. It is an organic semiconductor film.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 14 The optical absorption onset of PSFDTBT film is at 629 nm , corresponding to an optical band gap of 1.97 eV.

Let's think step by step.

1. Optical absorption onset: This refers to the wavelength at which a material begins to absorb light. It is a property related to the material's optical behavior.
2. PSFDTBT film: This is the name of the specific material or film in question.
3. 629 nm: This is the wavelength at which the optical absorption onset occurs. It is a numerical value representing a property of the material.
4. 1.97 eV: This is the optical band gap of the material. It is a numerical value representing a property of the material.

So, the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. Optical absorption onset
2. Optical band gap
3. 629 nm
4. 1.97 eV

These entities describe the optical properties of the PSFDTBT film.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. Optical band gap: 1.97 eV

This is the only entity in the paragraph that clearly refers to a material property. The other entities, "optical absorption onset" and "629 nm," describe the location or value of the material property, but they do not directly name the property itself.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Optical band gap |
| 1.97 eV |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 14 The optical absorption onset of PSFDTBT film is at 629 nm , corresponding to an optical band gap of 1.97 eV.

Let's think step by step.

1. Optical absorption onset of PSFDTBT film: This is a property value representing the wavelength (629 nm) at which the PSFDTBT film starts absorbing optical energy.
2. Optical band gap: This is a property value representing the energy difference (1.97 eV) between the conduction band and valence band in the PSFDTBT film.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. Optical absorption onset of PSFDTBT film: 629 nm
2. Optical band gap: 1.97 eV

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Optical absorption onset of PSFDTBT film: 629 nm |
| Optical band gap: 1.97 eV |
